title: What do you call a Yasuo who can solo Baron?

replies.body: i didn't get that refference
Samurai Jack.
if i knew who this guy was, i'd get that refference... so, re-phrase, who's that guy?
Early 2000s cartoon network show about a Samurai who gets catapulted into the future by a demon named Aku, and has to get back to the past so he can prevent Aku's rise to power.

Long ago in a distant land, I, Aku, the shape-shifting Master of Darkness, unleashed an unspeakable evil! But a foolish Samurai warrior wielding a magic sword stepped forth to oppose me. Before the final blow was struck, I tore open a portal in time and flung him into the future, where my evil is law! Now the fool seeks to return to the past, and undo the future that is Aku!

gotta get back, back to the past, samurai jack (watch out)

gotta get back, back to the past, samurai jack, jack jack, jack jack jack.

gotta get back, back to the past, samurai jack. (watch out)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NWEd8yDEURc
...that sounds like it has the potential to become extremely paradoxical...
Rip childhood
Not that I think it's bad, but I've never understood the obsession outside 'childhood was awesome'.
I'm very sorry
why downvote? he just doesnt get it...

UPVOTE FOR SAMURAI JACK

Ahhhhh.. Samurai Jack. One of the best shows ever made, in my opinion. It's a shame it never got a proper ending. Here's to hoping the supposed reboot/remake will be just as good as the original. Can only try to think and keep my hopes up.

http://media0.giphy.com/media/b5P1T2WXk6Ot2/giphy.gif

Samurai Jack :D

I hope it will be too, as long as they never go thru with a live action one. I feel that would be a flop. Too much content to fit in an 1-2 hour movie, and a TV series.. yeah.. No.
http://i.imgur.com/IZEjU.gif
Fffwit-fwitcha!
I have indeed soloed a few barons in my time. Good stuff. Need to be insanely fed to pull it off.
This post is very original and funny.
